import { useEffect } from 'react' import { observer } from 'mobx-react-lite' import { useRootStore } from '../stores/root.store' import { Alert, IconButton, Paper, Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableContainer, TableHead, Tooltip, Typography, Select, MenuItem, TableRow, Stack } from '@mui/material' import BlockIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Block' import CheckIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Check' import DeleteOutlineIcon from '@mui/icons-material/DeleteOutline' import RestoreFromTrashIcon from '@mui/icons-material/RestoreFromTrash' import DeleteForeverIcon from '@mui/icons-material/DeleteForever' import Loader from '../components/loader/Loader' import { Row } from './AdminPage.styles' import type { UserRole } from '../types' const AdminPage = observer(() => { const { users, auth } = useRootStore() useEffect(() => { if (auth.isAdmin) users.fetch() // eslint-disable-next-line react-hooks/exhaustive-deps }, [auth.isAdmin]) if (!auth.isAdmin) return Эта страница только для администраторов return ( Пользователи {users.isLoading ? : users.error ? ( {users.error} ) : ( ID Имя E-mail Роль Заблокирован Действия {users.list.map(u => { const self = auth.user?.id === u.id const disabled = users.isProcessing(u.id) || self return ( {u.id} {u.name} {u.email} {/* смена роли */} size="small" value={u.role} disabled={disabled || !!u.isDeleted} onChange={(e) => users.setRole(u.id, e.target.value as UserRole)} > user admin {u.isBlocked ? 'Да' : 'Нет'} {/* блок/разблокировать — отключим для себя и удалённых */} {!u.isDeleted && ( u.isBlocked ? ( users.setBlocked(u.id, false)} > ) : ( users.setBlocked(u.id, true)} > ) )} {/* удаление / восстановление */} {!u.isDeleted ? ( users.softDelete(u.id)} > ) : ( <> users.restore(u.id)} > users.hardDelete(u.id)} > )} ) })} {users.list.length === 0 && ( Нет данных )}
)} ) }) export default AdminPage
